value:
This kingdom is blessed by
such abundance—and graced
with such bright spirits!$k$pI believe that this place is so
happy that there are few, if any,
orphans that go unloved.

In case anyone asks, feel free
to share the fact that I am a
man—and not a woman.$k$pIt is hardly anyone's business,
yet still the question has nipped
at my heels for years.

I have pledged my service to
Lord Raym— Oh, sorry! I mean
Raven, of course.$k$pI continue to worry about his
welfare.

My staff can be used to heal my
allies but also to hurt my foes.
That is, if I must.

A moment...I beg you...please...$k$pAh, there. What ails me has
already passed.

You must be $Nu.$k$pI have come to deliver good tidings
from $Nf.

Such gains might better suit
others in our party.

I fared well—and pledge to put
this to use for us all.

Sorry... Merely a moment...
of weakness.

I hope that I have grown in both
body and spirit.

My name is Lucius. I can tend to your
wounded. So I beg you—please put
me to work immediately.

I have come to trust you more
than most I meet, so I feel it's
safe to share my story with you.$k$pWhen I was young, I suffered
terribly in an orphanage—children
ought never be so tormented.$k$pI also suffer what some might call a
sickness of the soul. What it is,
exactly, is difficult to say.$k$pEven now, when I think of how I
suffered...at that orphanage...my body
falls into lapses and strange fits.$k$pI'm sorry. I should have told you
all about this, but I wasn't yet
comfortable confiding it.$k$pI feared that you'd lose respect
for me if you knew the truth—or
would even be repulsed.$k$pI do such good works that I
shouldn't allow myself to care, but
when it comes to you...I do.$k$pI put myself in your hands. Will you
like or loathe me? But know this,
you will have my loyalty.
はっ！
えいっ！
うああっ！
No...
This debases us!
Oh, such pain!
May belief be enough!
Hands, stained with blood!
Into the light...!
Heehee
Darkness, begone.
Sweet relief.
Hmm. What is troubling you?
You may hear it questioned whether I am a man. I say the question...is a wrong one.
Those who mock the way others look cause great suffering in the world. I have suffered...considerably.
I hope always for my soul to soar. But sometimes I am weak. For that, I am sorry.
If ever your mind is troubled, please speak with me.
Yes?
Of course.
Shall we?
